price: Àwọn àrólé kan sì rólé lẹ́yìn wọn, tí wọ́n rá ìrun kíkí láre, tí wọ́n tẹ̀lé àwọn adùn. Láìpẹ́ wọn máa pàdé òfò (nínú Iná).
arabic: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fakhalafa min baʿdihim khalfun aḍāʿū al-ṣalata wa-ittabaʿū al-shahawāti fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
